column1: The Pit Room////Their coleslaw is refreshing and tangy
column2: and isn't reduced to a sopping mess by the end
column3: while their potato salad is creamy and rich. But the ultimate side to get here is the mac
column4: where the pasta is drenched in gooey cheese and tells you by way of cheese sauce ratio that you will be unbuttoning your pants before the end of the meal. The portions are identical in takeout and dine-in
